R1 001
R2 010
R3 011
R4 100
R5 101

R7 111
NOP 000000
SETC 000001
CLRC 000010
NOT 000011
INC 000100
DEC 000101
PUSH 111100
POP 110001
ADD 010111
SUB 011000
AND 011001
OR  011010
MOV 010110
SHL 011011
SHR 011111
LDM 010010
LDD 010011
STD 010100
JZ 100000
JN 100001
JC 100010
JMP 100100
CALL 100101
RET 100110
RTI 100111
IN 110011
OUT 001100
